name: Anchor Hot Chocolate
description: Anchor Hot Chocolate, a luxurious and indulgent treat for chocolate lover: Made with high-quality Belgian cocoa and finest milk from New Zealand, this hot chocolate powder delivers a rich and creamy taste experience. Anchor Hot Chocolate is easy to prepare, simply add hot water, stir, and enjoy. Meaning you can enjoy a delicious cup of hot chocolate whenever you crave it *Images for illustration purposes only. Product received may vary.
